institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operating rules/Article 42 (post-subsidy replacement)
contents: Article 42 (Post-subsidy replacement) ① The business group may preferentially execute the amount corresponding to the approved support fund with its own budget. ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the business group may implement any of the following items before approving the business plan for the relevant year. Expenses corresponding to the above can be first implemented with the company's own budget with the approval of the chairman and then replaced with support funds., 1. Cost of holding a business group steering committee, demand survey cost, and publicity cost for the approved training course, 2. Contracting company Costs related to education and training incurred due to unavoidable reasons, such as the need to urgently provide education and training at the request of (limited to eligible courses upon plan review)
